nodes.text: Jabba the Hutt and Other Bounty Hunters and Criminals
"Jabba the Hutt and Other Bounty Hunters and Criminals" is ambooklet in a series of canon reference booklets titled the Star Wars Encyclopedia. It was published on May 4, 2021.

The criminal character of the Hutts was known to everyone in the galaxy. Among the species, without a doubt, Jabba the Hutt was one of the most prominent crime lords. From his base on Tatooine, where he resided in a palace as decadent as it was gloomy, he gathered around him a series of criminals, bounty hunters and other hustlers who served him for purely financial reasons, but who deep down feared him. Those were times when working outside the law could be enormously profitable, and not just for Jabba or the rest of his species: individuals like Hondo Ohnaka, Cad Bane, Greedo or Zam Wesell earned their living, each one of them. his way, making money in some turbulent years such as those of the imperial era and the rise of the Rebellion.
